summary.para: Sets a new primitive blend mode. Allows access to the MAX primitive blend mode.

param.name: primitiveBlend
param.para: The primitive blend that will apply to subsequent primitives.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables access to the new primitive blend mode, MAX, through the method.
